data.title: Will Animal Crossing ever come to PS, Xbox, or will I need to buy a Nintendo Switch in order to play?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 4): Animal Crossing is created and owned by Nintendo. Nintendo, Sony, and Microsoft all use the titles they own to promote their respective platforms. Microsoft games now frequently cross between XBox and PC because Microsoft controls both platforms, and all three have allowed smalle...
